verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H2710>decree<s%> <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H2711>decrees,<s%> and to the writers who <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5999>oppressive<s%> <S%H3789>decrees;<s%>

to <S%H5186>deprive<s%> the <S%H1800>needy<s%> from <S%H1779>justice,<s%> and to <S%H1497>rob<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> among my <S%H5971>people<s%> of their <S%H4941>rights,<s%> that <S%H490>widows<s%> may be their <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and that they may make the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> their <S%H962>prey!<s%>

They <S%H1115>will<s%> only bow <S%H3766>down<s%> under the <S%H616>prisoners,<s%> and will <S%H5307>fall<s%> under the <S%H2026>slain.<s%> For all this his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still.<s%>
Alas <S%H804>Assyrian,<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> <S%H1945>of<s%> my <S%H639>anger,<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> in whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> is my <S%H2195>indignation!<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> him against a <S%H2611>profane<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and against the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H5678>anger<s%> me will I give him a <S%H6680>command<s%> to <S%H7997>take<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> and to <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>prey,<s%> and to tread them <S%H7760>down<s%> like the <S%H2563>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

However he <S%H1819>doesn't<s%> mean <S%H3824>so,<s%> neither does his heart <S%H2803>think<s%> <S%H3824>so;<s%> but it is in his heart to <S%H8045>destroy,<s%> and to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> not a <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
For he <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H3162>"Aren't<s%> all of my <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H4428>kings?<s%>
<S%H3641>Isn't<s%> Calno like <S%H3751>Carchemish?<s%> <S%H2574>Isn't<s%> Hamath like <S%H774>Arpad?<s%> <S%H8111>Isn't<s%> Samaria like <S%H1834>Damascus?<s%>"

As my <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H457>idols,<s%> whose engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> exceeded those of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%>
shall I <S%H6213>not,<s%> as I have done to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H457>idols,<s%> so <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and her <S%H6091>idols?<s%>

Therefore it will happen <S%H136>that,<s%> when the Lord has <S%H1214>performed<s%> his whole <S%H4639>work<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and on <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the willful <S%H1433>proud<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and the <S%H8597>insolence<s%> of his <S%H7312>haughty<s%> <S%H5869>looks.<s%>

For he has <S%H559>said,<s%> "By the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2451>it,<s%> and by my wisdom; for I have <S%H2451>understanding:<s%> and I have <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H1367>boundaries<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and have <S%H8154>robbed<s%> their <S%H6259>treasures.<s%> Like a <S%H47>valiant<s%> man I have brought <S%H3381>down<s%> their <S%H3427>rulers.<s%>

My <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> like a <S%H7064>nest,<s%> and like one <S%H622>gathers<s%> <S%H1000>eggs<s%> that are <S%H5800>abandoned,<s%> have I <S%H622>gathered<s%> all the <S%H776>earth.<s%> There was no one who <S%H5074>moved<s%> their <S%H3671>wing,<s%> or that <S%H6475>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> or <S%H6850>chirped.<s%>"

Should an <S%H1631>axe<s%> <S%H6286>brag<s%> against him who <S%H2672>chops<s%> with <S%H4883>it?<s%> Should a saw <S%H1431>exalt<s%> itself above him who <S%H5130>saws<s%> with <S%H7626>it?<s%> As if a rod should <S%H5130>lift<s%> those who lift it <S%H7311>up,<s%> or as if a <S%H4294>staff<s%> should lift <S%H7311>up<s%> someone who is not <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> among his fat <S%H4924>ones<s%> <S%H7332>leanness;<s%> and under his <S%H3519>glory<s%> a <S%H3350>burning<s%> will be <S%H3344>kindled<s%> like the burning of <S%H784>fire.<s%>

The <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be for a <S%H784>fire,<s%> and his Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> for a <S%H3852>flame;<s%> and it will <S%H1197>burn<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> his <S%H7898>thorns<s%> and his <S%H8068>briers<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

He will <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and of his fruitful <S%H3759>field,<s%> both <S%H5315>soul<s%> and <S%H1320>body.<s%> It will be as when a standard <S%H5263>bearer<s%> <S%H4549>faints.<s%>
The <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of his <S%H3293>forest<s%> shall be <S%H4557>few,<s%> so that a <S%H5288>child<s%> could write their <S%H3789>number.<s%>

It will come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and those who have <S%H6413>escaped<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will no more <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H8172>lean<s%> on him who <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H8172>them,<s%> but shall lean on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in <S%H571>truth.<s%>
A <S%H7605>remnant<s%> will <S%H7725>return,<s%> even the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

For though your <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are like the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> only a <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of them will <S%H7725>return.<s%> A <S%H3631>destruction<s%> is <S%H2782>determined,<s%> <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

For the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> will <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end,<s%> and that <S%H2782>determined,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> "My <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid of the <S%H804>Assyrian,<s%> though he <S%H5221>strike<s%> you with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4294>staff<s%> against <S%H4714>you,<s%> as Egypt <S%H1870>did.<s%>

For yet a <S%H4213>very<s%> little <S%H4592>while,<s%> and the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> against you will be <S%H3615>accomplished,<s%> and my <S%H639>anger<s%> will be directed to his <S%H8399>destruction.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will stir <S%H5782>up<s%> a <S%H7752>scourge<s%> against <S%H4347>him,<s%> as in the slaughter of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> at the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H6159>Oreb.<s%> His <S%H4294>rod<s%> will be over the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and he will lift it <S%H5375>up<s%> like he <S%H1870>did<s%> against <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that his <S%H5448>burden<s%> will depart from <S%H5493>off<s%> your <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> and his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from off your <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> shall be <S%H2254>destroyed<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the anointing <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
He has <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5857>Aiath.<s%> He has <S%H5674>passed<s%> through <S%H4051>Migron.<s%> At <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> he <S%H6485>stores<s%> his <S%H3627>baggage.<s%>
